mapper.select: SELECT c.chat_num,c.to_num,c.from_num,c.chatstate_num,c.content,c.chatboard_num,TO_CHAR(SEND_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') date_time, m.mem_num,m.name,m.passwd,m.photo,m.photo_name FROM dchatting c JOIN dmember_detail m ON c.from_num=m.mem_num WHERE chatboard_num=#{chatboard_num} AND ((from_num=#{from_num} AND to_num=#{to_num}) OR (from_num=#{to_num} AND to_num=#{from_num})) ORDER BY send_date ASC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT from_num, SUM(chatstate_num) chatstate_num FROM dchatting WHERE chatboard_num = #{chatboard_num} AND from_num!=#{from_num} GROUP BY from_num)c JOIN dmember_detail m ON c.from_num=m.mem_num
